品质优越；品质卓越；质量优良

bilingual.target: 你必须遵守上级的命令。

bilingual.source: He acted on the hest of his superior.
bilingual.target: 他按照上级的命令行事。

bilingual.source: He has great respect for his superior.
bilingual.target: 他对他的上级非常尊敬。

bilingual.source: The soldier obeys orders from his superior.

bilingual.target: 军人必须顺从上级的命令。

bilingual.source: The soldier obeyed the orders from his superior.
bilingual.target: 士兵遵从了上级的命令。

bilingual.source: My superior is very supportive of my work.
bilingual.target: 我的上级非常支持我的工作。

bilingual.source: The superior usually provides us with guidance.
bilingual.target: 上级通常会给我们提供指导。

bilingual.source: He chose to defy the orders given by his superior.
bilingual.target: 他选择反抗上级下达的命令。

list.abstract: superior，英文单词，作名词、形容词，翻译为上级（的）、长者、出众的、高傲等。

yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么他总是那副盛气凌人的样。

yingyinNormal.en: Superior to all others? I did not mean to offend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比任何人都要睿智吗？我无意冒犯。

yingyinNormal.en: The scholars and historians of Venice are superior to all others across the land.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威尼斯的学者和历史学家比世界上的任何人都要睿智。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think you mean to do this, but sometimes you sound very dismissive and superior.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你不是故意这样的，但有时你听起来相当轻蔑，满是优越感。

yingyinNormal.en: I, on the other hand, am less aesthetically pleasing, but am superior in every other area.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而我，相比而言，以审美的角度看就不太令他满意，其他方面还是比你们强多了。

yingyinNormal.en: And the fact that we're not doesn't make me feel all right and superior. It makes me feel sad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 发现这个事实并没让我感到轻松或是优越，我觉得悲伤。

yingyinNormal.en: The treatments available to the village would be vastly superior to anything we can lay claim to now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 届时村民们能得到的治疗，会比我们现在能提供的先进很多。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd like to discuss this and other more pressing matters with your immediate superior, the President.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要与你的直司上司，美国总统探讨此事，以及其他迫切事宜。

yingyinNormal.en: Which, as I understand it, involves the mass genocide of any being you find to be less than superior.
yingyinNormal.zh: 据我说知，你们的事业是要消灭所有比你们低等的生命。

yingyinNormal.en: The Boov may be superior in many ways, Yeah. but not in the ways that I now thinks are most important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 波波族虽然在很多方面很强。对。但不是在我现在认为重要的方面厉害。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, it kind of... Let's keep looking. Whoa, what's $1,800 to the Los Angeles County Superior Court?
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上这就是...我们还是继续看吧，哪儿来的洛杉矶高等法院的1800美金罚款？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you could include us in your little brain trust. You can more than include us. You can bow down to our superior intellect.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可以把我们收入你们的智囊团。不仅要收我们。还要臣服于我们的超群智慧。

yingyinNormal.en: I've often observed to Lady Catherine that her daughter seemed born to be a duchess, for she has all the superior graces of elevated rank.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我常说凯瑟琳夫人，她的女儿好像出生就是女公爵，因为她拥有贵族们所有的优雅。

yingyinNormal.en: Genetically engineered to be superior so as to lead others to peace in a world at war. But we were condemned as criminals, forced into exile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过基因改造成为高人一等的存在，这样就能带领其他人为处于战争中的世界带来和平，但我们被诬蔑为罪犯，不得不流亡。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, you do it to feel superior. I see that twinkle in your eye when someone says "who" instead of "whom" or thinks the moon is a planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，你只是给自己带来优越感，每次有人犯语法错误或是把月亮当作行星时，我都能看到你两眼放光。

yingyinNormal.en: I took a tactical risk and I woke that bastard up, believing that his superior intelligence could help us protect ourselves from whatever came at us next.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我冒了一个战略性风险，唤醒了那个混蛋，我以为他超人的智力能保护我们，应对未来任何挑战。

yingyinNormal.en: One afternoon, off the coast of Lake Superior, he spotted a yacht in peril. He rowed out and rescued the vessel and its captain, alcoholic millionaire Dan Cody.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一天下午，在苏必利尔湖的岸边，他看见一艘游艇处于险境，他奋力划行，拯救了那游艇和它的主人酒鬼富豪，丹·科迪。

yingyinNormal.en: Amy pointed out that between the two of us, our genetic material has the potential of producing the first in a line of intellectually superior, benign overlords to guide humanity to a brighter tomorrow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米指出通过我俩的结合，我们的基因将会有机会制造出前所未有的，智力超群，仁慈善良的君主带领人类走向光明未来。

yingyinNormal.en: Moreover, when updating impressions based on people's behaviors, activity in the ventrolateral prefrontal cortex and the superior temporal sulcus correlates with perceptions of how frequently those behaviors occur in daily life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 此外，更新印象的时候，若是以行为做基础，在腹侧前额叶皮质区以及上侧颞叶沟的活动和我们所认为那些行为在生活中出现的频率有关。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 更高的; 更好的; 有优势的(人)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage: superior作形容词时，本身含有“较”的含义，所以没有比较级或最高级，通常用“superior...to...”表示“两事物的比较”，如：This model is technically superior to its competitors. 这种型号在技术上优于竞争对手。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 更高的; 更好的; 有优势的(人)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 优越；优势；傲慢的行为

word_family.mean: adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的

sense_info_list.zh: 更高的; 更好的; 有优势的(人)

examination_example.sentence: There's a risk that human civilization could be replaced by a <highlight>superior</highlight> type of digital life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类文明有可能被更高级的数字生活所取代。

examination_example.sentence: Public universities are often <highlight>superior</highlight> to private universities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公立大学往往优于私立大学。

examination_example.sentence: Congress needs to find the courage to allow Medicare to pay preferentially for treatments proven to be <highlight>superior</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国会需要鼓起勇气，允许医疗保险优先支付更好的治疗产生的费用。

sense_info_list.en: a person of higher rank, status or position

examination_example.sentence: Often a manager's <highlight>superiors</highlight> can effectively encourage a manager's distasteful behavior when they fail to discipline the person's wrongdoings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常情况下，当管理者的上级未能对其不当行为进行惩戒时，他们会有效地鼓励管理者做出令人不快的行为。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: Participants were able to learn 20 percent faster after the intense running and they showed a <highlight>superior</highlight> memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参与者在激烈的跑步后能够学习快20%，并且他们表现出超强的记忆力。

examination_example.sentence: Human numerical instincts are not so <highlight>superior</highlight> to those of other mammals as is generally believed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类的数字本能并不像人们普遍认为的那样优于其他哺乳动物。

examination_example.sentence: Like other outsiders, I was continually impressed by their <highlight>superior</highlight> understanding of the ecology we shared.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像其他局外人一样，他们对我们共享生态的卓越理解不断给我留下深刻印象。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 优越；优势；傲慢的行为

word_family.mean: adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的

sense_info_list.en: a person of higher rank, status or position

examination_example.sentence: Though one of the executives acknowledged that Brutus had the good of the republic in mind, Caesar was nevertheless his <highlight>superior</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然有一位执政官承认布鲁图是为共和国着想，但恺撒仍然是他的上司。

examination_example.sentence: According to the author, a <highlight>superior</highlight> doctor is one who brings knowledge of other fields to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据作者的说法，一个优秀的医生是一个能将其他领域的知识带到工作中的人。

examination_example.sentence: The doctor who is also a poet and philosopher is a <highlight>superior</highlight> doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位医生，同时也是诗人和哲学家，是一位优秀的医生。
